DOC.brief_summary: To Compare Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic Profiles BEPO-A REPO-A Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Single Subcutaneous Dose BEPO REPO Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: To Compare Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic Profiles EPO ( BEPO-A ( 4000 IU ) ) EPO ( REPO-A ( 4000 IU ) ) Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Agree purpose study sign date Informed Consent ; Male , age 19 40 year , clinically healthy ; BMI 19 28 ; 90 mmHg ≤ SBP < 140 mmHg , 50 mmHg ≤ DBP < 85 mmHg Hemoglobin < 13 g / dL Ferritin < 20 ng/mL TIBC > 360 ug/ dL Vitamin B12 < 200 pg/mL floate < 4 ng/mL % reticulpcyte > 3 % platelet < 100,000/ul > 400,000/ul GFR < 60mL/min/1.73m2 Going treatment tumor Clinical history allergy biological product derive mammalian albumin component formulation Clinical history autoimmune hereditary anemia A Positive reaction nicotine test Principal Investigator study criterion .
